Located in the administration building, there is the 100-seat restaurant Kastari and the 30-seat cabinet kastare. Daily food in the restaurant is delicious and soup of the day manufactured by the chef is available.
Kastari carries out the order of Cabinet lunches and other catering. The professional staff will tailor services and catering for different occasions.
Together with Saalasti hall and lobby in the main building in the University, Kastari forms a unique space with a 1430-seat holding company events, dinners, meetings, seminars, banquets and entertainment events needs.
Opening time: Mon-Thu 8:00-17:30, Fri 8:00-14:30

If you choose to study for example Information Processing Science, Electrical Engineering or Computer Science and Engineering, Tietotalo will be your “home” at the university. Take a look at the first day of new students of computer science and engineering at the university!\nhttp://www.oulu.fi/itee/node/40560

Big size, lots of flavour. Nobody leaves our place hungry! Our home food-based lunch makes a big impression with its no-nonsense, delicious and plentiful selection. It includes familiar classics and delicious favourites from around the world. For more energy, have our protein-rich breakfasts and snacks. Make yourself at hom e in the rugged "man cave"!\nOpening time: Mon-Thu 9:00-15.00, Fri 9:00-14:30

The Sodankylä Geophysical Observatory performs continuous measurements of the Earth\'s magnetic field, cosmic radio noise, seismic activities, and cosmic rays. Altogether SGO runs measurements in 19 different locations from southern Finland to Svalbard.\nMore info in Finnish: http://www.oulu.fi/sgo/\n More info in English: http://www.oulu.fi/sgoenglish/

AIESEC is the world\'s largest non-profit student-run organization. It is an international non-governmental not-for-profit organization that provides young people with leadership development and cross-cultural global internship and volunteer exchange experiences across the globe, with a focus to empower young people so they can make a positive impact on society. The AIESEC network includes approximately 70,000 members in 127 countries and territories. It is the largest youth-run organization in the world

IT Administration Services are responsible for the administration and operation of the University's data network, computer system maintenance, software and the promotion of information security. IT Services produce services for the research, teaching, studying, administration and for different interest groups.

 What they can provide:
— university's user account and activation of a new account
— password and how to change it
— e-mail and activating of O365 service
— workstations for student use on Linnanmaa kampus
— wireless networks panOULU and eduroam
— free software for students and software sale
— helpdesk services of IT Administration

Tellus Innovation Arena is a brand new, inspiring open space for learning, collaboration and entrepreneurship at the heart of University of Oulu\'s Linnanmaa campus and its multidisciplinary community. It was created for all you open-minded explorers from both inside and outside of the University to help you meet people, get in touch with some of the best experts in town and beyond, expand your networks, develop ideas, share your knowledge, present your projects and create valuable things together with others.\nMore info in English: http://www.oulu.fi/tellusarena/\nMore info in Finnish: http://www.oulu.fi/tellusarena-fi/

Fab Lab Oulu is a small digital manufacturing working area (fabrication laboratory) that complies with open innovation concept developed by MIT in the United States. In Fab Lab it is possible to design your own product or hardware from the scratch.\nMore info in English http://www.oulu.fi/fablab/

Bring various activities into your daily life. There are events happen in the university everyday and here is one of the place to witness them take place. Here you can meet International Mother Language Day, Career Day,Abipäivät, get to know new friends and buy your latest party tickets.

The cities of the world on your plate: The bright colours and international flavours of the big city food courts bring friends together! At our grill stations you will find the best in street food: from tender strips of pulled pork to hot dogs and from stir fries to pizza slices. Fill your plate with tasty delights straight from South America or pop in for a visit to Asia. The Deli Salad Bar will serve you when you want to take it easy and light.\nOpening time: Mon-Thu 10.00-16.00, Fri 10.00-14.30.

Student Center provides comprehensive services for students starting with registration to the university and going all the way to alumni services. The Student Center offers services to all students including exchange students and doctoral students, and also students who wish to take courses in the Open University.\nMore info about studies in English: http://www.oulu.fi/university/node/34985\nMore info about studies in Finnish: http://www.oulu.fi/yliopisto/opiskelijakeskus

Experience the exotic North and harmonious Scandinavian interior design! We conjure up taste sensations where classic recipes combine with modern influences from both the East and West. Our menu has casual meat and fish dishes, colourful salads, the best seasonal soups and vegetable stews. Rye bread, oatmeal porridge and fresh buns makes a good start for the day.\nOpening time:Mon-Thu 7.45-18.30, Fri 8.30-18.00, Sat 9.00-15.00

The museum forms an integral part of an international network of natural science museums functioning as a repository of knowledge and an expert body on biodiversity-related issues.\n More info in English http://www.oulu.fi/biodiversityunit/node/16772\n More info in Finnish http://www.oulu.fi/biodiversiteettiyksikko/node/1372

Oulu University Library is a scientific library whose task is to provide library and information services for the researchers, teachers and students of the University of Oulu.The Library is open to all public.\nMore info about studies in English: http://www.oulu.fi/library/\nMore info about studies in Finnish: http://www.oulu.fi/kirjasto/

The aim is to understand that finding a balance with our families, friends, careers, school, sports and so much more can be a challenge. They are offering an alternative to sacrificing the way you feel after eating fast food with a fresh homemade approach ready within minutes.\nOpening time: mon-thu 8.30-14.30, lunch 10.00 - 14.30; fri 8.30-14.00, lunch 10.00 - 14.00

The Faculty of Education is a multidisciplinary expert organisation for training, research and development in the field of education and teaching.The Faculty provides high-quality education and research in a multidisciplinary and international academic environment. In addition to Bachelor\'s and Master\'s degrees, the Faculty offers a variety of postgraduate and continuing education opportunities. There are numerous research groups and projects which function in different cooperation and development projects in both the public and the private sector.There is also a teacher training school functioning under the auspices of the Faculty of Education.\nMore info in English http://www.oulu.fi/edu/admissions\nMore info in Finnish http://www.oulu.fi/ktk/opiskelijavalinta
Your internet connection is turned off

UniTour application is created to help guests and visitors of the University of Oulu to get acquainted with the most significant locations of the campus. Sign up to play a QR quest or just explore the university map without any registration.

Created by Team A for the Software Factory Project course in 2017. 

http://unitour.000webhostapp.com/
